Room.Name: Over the Dennanl Abyss
Room.ShortDescription: You are flying across the mysterious and apparently bottomless Dennanl Abyss.
Room.LongDescription: The eerie feeling you get while crossing over the empty blackness of the Abyss with only your magic keeping you from falling is amplified by even more mysterious things you see below you. Occasional flickers of light and sounds of movement come from the Abyss.
